page.title: 12The Seven Stars public house
page.content: The Seven Stars pub is over 400 years old and is situated on the A34 near Brocton. The present lease owner has been the tenant for 25 years. The opening hours of the pub are 11a.m. to 3p.m. and 6p.m. to 11p.m. except Sunday on which it opens from 12p.m. to 2p.m. and 7p.m. to 10.30p.m. The pub is family run with a very friendly atmosphere. As well as normal pub facilities the pub also provides a clay pigeon club, Osprey watersports rescue team, junior football team and a very successful darts team. Many different people go into the pub, between the ages of 18 and 80. Most of these are regulars. Passing trade accounts for about 10% of its custom.
